page.title: 16Beverley Beck
page.content: On Beverley Beck most of the boats are motor cruisers,there are a few yachts and very few dinghys. You can see cargo ships on the River Hull;a few from Beverley,but they come mainly from Whitby. On the Beck there is one light ship and a new wharf which has a crane on it. Beside the Beck there is an art gallery next door to the lock-keepers cottage. The lock is not used very regularly these days so the lock-keeper has more free time to follow his own interests. Alongside the Beck there is a boat-yard that builds and repairs barges and other boats. On the Beck itself you can see swans, ducks and one goose.
